alert.note: Alert for Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Queens and southern Nassau Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 329 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jamaica, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elmont around 335 PM EDT. Valley Stream and Garden City around 340 PM EDT. Westbury and Hempstead around 345 PM EDT. Levittown and Freeport around 350 PM EDT. Wantagh around 355 PM EDT. Massapequa and Farmingdale around 400 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm, and a Flood Advisory has also been issued for this storm. The heavy rainfall may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens
